title: Looking for Gold+ ADC and Jungler/Top Subs!
body:
Hay guys, looking for *ADC (Marksman)* and *Jungle/Top* for our Amateur Ranked Team! The team has recently reached Gold and are looking for more active subs for our team! Currently we don't have a proper 'schedule' but we try and get as many games as we can in a week! Usually from ***8-9PM AWST*** onwards, but that can change if we are looking to improve!

If anyone is looking to sub for a team, we are looking for **2** people! Thankyou!

REQUIREMENTS:

  -  Skype (With working headset)

  -  Gold or higher ranking

  -  Being on OCE Server

  -  Facebook for out of client team discussions

**EDIT**: Only looking for *Jungler/Top laner* now!

**EDIT2**: No longer looking for subs!

replies.body:
Hey 
i am a plat 3 adc 
can play/learn what is needed 
the champs i currently play are Lucian Corki Vayne and Jinx
I have skype and facebook
would be fun to try out :D
IGN= SNG Aleks

I Main the new S5 Jungle Gold V

Add me on league if your interested

Noticed you have not received any comments so thought I would throw my hate in the ring. The caveat is that I am in Bronze 2 but I am keen, play jungle and top a lot and I am decent enough to consider as a sub IMO. Available most week nights. In game nic is Sugar13.
